snippet: The Eifman Ballet of St. Petersburg performed Boris Eifman’s “Rodin” ballet, based on the life of the French sculptor Auguste Rodin and his tumultuous relationship with his mistress and muse.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews American premiere of Boris Eifman's ballet Rodin, based on life of French sculptor Auguste Rodin, performed by the Eifman Ballet of St Petersburg at City Center.
lead_paragraph: The Eifman Ballet of St. Petersburg performed Boris Eifman’s “Rodin” ballet, based on the life of the French sculptor Auguste Rodin and his tumultuous relationship with his mistress and muse.

headline.seo: Eifman Ballet of St. Petersburg at City Center
headline.main: Sculpture and Mania of a Muse
headline.print_headline: Sculpture And Mania Of a Muse
